about_the_game:
Ravenous is a new type of rolling action game in which you control Enlil, a crow with mysterious powers, to rescue your friends captured by robots.

◆Rolling Action
Enlil has strong power mainly in horizontal direction. By "rotating" other than yourself, you can lead your enemies to a convenient position and knock them down.

◆Gravity Manipulation
Even an obstructive object can become a great weapon if you "rotate" the world! Manipulate gravity and drop them on your enemies.

Reinforcement system
If you keep producing enemies and destroying "generators", you will get the power to strengthen them at once. Choose your favorite reinforcement and attack the dungeon.

◆Permanent reinforcement system
Use various items you can get when you clear the game to get permanent power and challenge the strong enemies that stand ahead of you.

◆Boss Battle
At the end of the dungeon, there may be a trap with a large number of enemies or a boss lurking around. The bosses are very powerful, so use the power you have acquired to defeat them."
